item.title: The 'Dirty 15' percent: Some countries will take a harder hit from Trump's tariffs
item.description: Trump has pointed to America's trade deficits as he argues that virtually all trading partners are "taking advantage" of the U.S.

item.title: Battle over Greenland heats up with Denmark's PM set to visit just days after JD Vance
item.description: The battle over Greenland is set to intensify this week as Denmark's prime minister visits the Arctic island days after U.S. Vice President JD Vance.

item.title: Indiana U. fired cybersecurity professor XiaoFeng Wang on day FBI searched his homes: Union

item.title: Trump says reciprocal tariffs will 'start with all countries,' rejects narrower launch
item.description: Some Trump administration officials have suggested that the reciprocal tariffs would be focused on a handful of countries with large U.S. trade imbala...

item.title: Trump commutes sentence of Ozy Media founder Carlos Watson just before prison surrender
item.description: Ozy had falsely claimed to have deals with Google and Oprah Winfrey before the company and CEO Watson were criminally charged.
